scripts.build-all: npm run build-dashboard && npm run build-stagehandtest
scripts.build-dashboard: cd dashboard && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-code-turtle: cd code-turtle && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-stagehandtest: cd testBrowserbase/stagehandtest && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-browser-testing: cd first-agent/browser_base_testing && npm install && npx tsc
scripts.start-all: npm run start-dashboard && npm run start-stagehandtest
scripts.install-all: npm run install-dashboard && npm run install-code-turtle && npm run install-stagehandtest && npm run install-browser-testing
